result.arabic_text: قَالَ هَٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةٞ لَّهَا شِرۡبٞ وَلَكُمۡ شِرۡبُ يَوۡمٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ
result.translation: Swalehe yababwiye ati: “Ng’iyo ingamiya mwarungikiwe n’Imana Allah, kugira ibabere icemezo cerekana ko ndi mu kuri, yagenewe gushoka ku musi wayo na mwe mukaba murekuriwe kuvoma ku musi uzwi ukurikira;
